long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unofficial Chrome extension that adds useful features to Donder Hiroba (ドンだーひろば)

Features
- Advanced song search in score page
- Rating system 
- Integration with Korean TaikoWiki Level Chart (http://taiko.wiki/diffchart/clear/10/)
- Create playlist and quickly set "Favorite Songs Folder" as a playlist you made
- Some UI translation (not perfect)

Song data are provided by taiko.wiki, Thanks!

More details on Github (https://github.com/exqt/donder-hiroba-plus)
